hosting_dashboard_loading_error: An error has occurred loading information. This error may be due to an ad-blocker being enabled.
hosting_dashboard_add_or_order_step1_tit: What action do you want to take?
hosting_add_step1_title: You are about to add a domain to your web hosting plan
hosting_add_step1_no_db_left: You cannot add any more domains to your web hosting plan
hosting_add_step1_order_upgrade: To get an additional domain name for your hosting plan, please upgrade to a higher plan
hosting_add_step1_only_one_db_and_no_lef: With your current plan, you can install only one website. To get an additional website, upgrade to one of our higher plans.
hosting_add_step2_common_domain_exists: The domain selected is already linked to the web hosting plan
hosting_add_step2_common_domain_exists_w: The domain {{t0}} is already linked to the web hosting plan
hosting_add_step2_common_domain_ssl_inva: The domain name is invalid. If you choose the SSL option, the domain name must not be longer than {{t0}} characters.
hosting_add_step2_common_domain_invalid_: The domain name must not include capitals.
The domain name cannot contain upper-case or special characters.
hosting_add_step2_mode_EXTERNAL_question: Select the information of the external domain to be linked to the hosting plan (formerly known as multi-domain)
hosting_add_step2_information_mode_EXTER: For the configuration to function, you will need to make the following adjustments with the current provider:
hosting_add_step2_mode_EXTERNAL_attentio: Important The configuration will not function without these modifications.
hosting_add_step2_mode_OVH_question: Select the information of the domain to be linked to the web hosting plan
hosting_multisite_domain_configuration_c: Enable the country IP to geolocate the international parts of your site, in order to optimise their SEO.
hosting_multisite_domain_configuration_f: Enable the firewall for enhanced protection of your site.
hosting_multisite_domain_configuration_o: Enable this option to get separate logs for your multi-domain.
hosting_add_step2_mode_OVH_domain_name_s: You cannot untick the box below with a STARTER solution.
Click here to upgrade to a higher hosting plan.
hosting_add_step2_information_mode_OVH: Configuration to be applied to the DNS zone
hosting_add_step3_summary: Are you sure to want to add this/these domain/s to your hosting plan?
hosting_add_step3_mode_OVH_autoconfigure: The automatic configuration corresponds to creating the A and AAAA records in the DNS zone of the domain
hosting_add_step3_compatibility_nok: Important There are conflicts with the current configuration:
hosting_add_step3_compatibility_warning: A redirection for the {{t0}} domain already exists (record type {{t1}})
hosting_add_step3_compatibility_importan: Important: automatic configuration will attempt to resolve conflicts by deleting records that are incompatible with the new configuration from the DNS zone.
hosting_add_step3_delete_4a_records: Delete the AAAA records for your {{domain}} domain
hosting_add_step3_common_action: Point the {{t0}} record of your {{t1}} domain to {{t2}}
hosting_add_step3_insert_token_field: Insert a {{t0}} record for the {{t1}} domain, and insert the value {{t2}}
hosting_tab_DOMAINS_configuration_add_su: The domain(s) have been added to your hosting plan.
hosting_tab_DOMAINS_configuration_add_fa: An error has occurred adding the domain(s) to your hosting plan.
hosting_managed_wordpress_websites_descr: Create a new site or import an existing site to this account in just a few clicks.
Create a new site on this account in just a few clicks.
hosting_dashboard_modal_update_descripti: Please enter the new name you wish to give your site. This is an internal name, visible only to you.
hosting_dashboard_modal_update_success: Your site name has been successfully updated
tab_DOMAINS_configuration_add_failure: An error occurred while adding the domain(s) to your shared hosting.
cdn_shared_info: Find the settings for the Shared CDN option. Standard settings are applied by default to help you get started simply and quickly. The advanced options CDN Security and CDN Advanced give you access to more settings.
cdn_shared_help: Need help with your site's statistics and logs?
cdn_shared_option_always_online_info: The CDN continues to respond to requests, even in the event of an origin server failure.
cdn_shared_option_http_https_info: Increase the performance and security of your site by using the HTTP/2 protocol.
cdn_shared_option_brotli_info: Reduce the size of transferred data using state-of-the-art Brotli algorithms.
cdn_shared_option_dev_mode_info: Developer mode to force the CDN to always fetch values from the origin server.
cdn_shared_option_advanced_flush_info: Customize your purge by choosing which cache items to clear: the entire site, a folder, a URI, a file extension, or using a custom regular expression. Accessible directly from the Multisite tab in the actions list.
cdn_shared_option_advanced_flush_info_fo: Customize your purge by choosing which cache items to clear: the entire site, a folder, a URI, a file extension, or using a custom regular expression. The advanced purge is available via the CDN Advanced option. Would you like to change your plan?
cdn_shared_option_query_string_info: Manage content caching based on URL query parameters, also known as "Query String." Depending on your configuration, the CDN will distribute the following resource:
cdn_shared_option_query_string_sort_igno: Disabled = The resource is cached by sorting its parameters.
cdn_shared_option_query_string_sort_true: Enabled - Sort parameters = The resource is cached by sorting its parameters.
cdn_shared_option_query_string_sort_fals: Enabled - Ignore parameters = The resource is cached without any parameters
cdn_shared_option_prewarm_info: Force permanent caching of your critical resources. The CDN anticipates and automatically refreshes the cache, without waiting for a user request.
cdn_shared_option_http_geolocation_info: Know the visitor's country to personalize the offered experience. The country code is automatically added to the header of each request to be handled by your origin server.
cdn_shared_option_prefetch_info: Anticipate the loading of the next resource. Preload the resource automatically into the cache using the Link header. This must be present in the header of each page of the website requiring Prefetch.
cdn_shared_option_mobile_redirect_info: Automatically redirect "Mobile" visitors to an optimized website. Optionally: systematically redirect to the root of another website, or keep the URL by only replacing the domain (or subdomain).
cdn_shared_option_cache_rule_add_rule_ma: The {{range}} offer allows you to add up to {{maxItems}} rules maximum.
cdn_shared_option_cors_description: Specify the external domains that will be allowed access to your web resources.
cdn_shared_option_cors_edit: Edit the list of external resources
cdn_shared_option_https_redirect_descrip: Protect all traffic to your website by redirecting it to HTTPS protocol temporarily or permanently.
cdn_shared_option_hsts_description: Enforce access to your website over HTTPS only. Your solution is thus secured against downgrade attacks.
cdn_ssl_required_warning: Note that the option you have enabled requires SSL to be active on the subdomain. Please check the SSL configuration on the subdomain.
cdn_shared_option_mixed_content_descript: Force the loading of all content on your web pages securely, thus contributing to an optimal user experience. All resources on your site, both internal and external, must be available over HTTPS.
cdn_shared_option_waf_description: Protect your site with our firewall against fraudulent attacks such as injection, illegitimate requests, or data theft. Protect yourself from the main known web vulnerabilities by filtering requests and transmitted packets (the list of vulnerabilities is managed and regularly updated by OVHcloud).
cdn_shared_change_offer_modal_info: The advanced purge is available via the CDN Advanced option. Would you like to change your plan?
cdn_shared_banner_success: The configuration of your CDN has been successfully taken into account and will be applied to your domain name.
cdn_shared_modal_add_rule_info: Create a new cache rule for this configuration. Each cache rule allows you to define a refresh frequency for a subset of your site.
cdn_shared_modal_add_rule_resource_info: For the CDN Basic and Security offer, it is only possible to enter a file extension.
cdn_shared_modal_add_rule_field_resource: Please enter a valid file extension without a dot, for example: css
Please enter a valid path for one of the folders present in the root directory of your website, for example: /css/
Please enter a valid regular expression, for example: .*.css
Please enter a valid URI for your website, for example: /product/howto.pdf
cdn_shared_modal_field_rule_name_error_p: Must only contain numbers, unaccented letters, underscores, and hyphens.
cdn_shared_modal_add_rule_field_time_to_: The lifespan indicates how often you want the CDN to refresh your content in its cache. This duration can be expressed in several time units using the dropdown menu.
cdn_shared_modal_add_rule_field_order_by: Your cache rules are executed in the order of their ranking. By assigning the number 1, your rule will be executed first and so on.
cdn_shared_change_edit_urls_modal_info: Define the list of URLs to be systematically refreshed in the cache.
cdn_shared_cors_description: The external domains you specify here will be allowed to access your web resources
cdn_shared_modal_confirm_info: Click 'Validate' to apply the changes made to your configuration. By clicking 'Cancel', all your recent changes will be lost.
deploy_git_description: You are about to deploy or manually update the content of your remote repository on your hosting.
deploy_git_overwrite_local_changes: In case of modification conflict, force the remote changes onto your local repository.
